# ShawnOS — shawnos.ai
> GTM engineering, built in public. The personal operating system of Shawn Tenam — where go-to-market engineering, content engineering, and AI-native development converge.

## About
- Author: Shawn Tenam
- Sites: shawnos.ai, thegtmos.ai, thecontentos.ai
- Architecture: Next.js monorepo with shared packages, deployed on Vercel

## Content Types
- Blog: /blog — GTM engineering stories, build logs, and insights
- Knowledge Base: /knowledge — Engineering and AI concepts explained
- How-To Wiki: /how-to — Step-by-step guides for AI IDEs, CLI tools, MCP servers, GEO/SEO
- Daily Logs: /log — Daily build tracking with scores and accomplishments
- Content Wiki: /content-wiki — Platform playbooks, voice systems, content workflows
- Context Wiki: /context-wiki — Context engineering patterns and practices

## Feeds
- RSS: /feed.xml (blog), /feed/all.xml (everything), /feed/knowledge.xml, /feed/how-to.xml, /feed/daily-logs.xml
- All feeds: RSS 2.0 format

## Key Topics
- Go-to-market engineering
- AI-native development (Claude Code, Cursor, MCP servers)
- Content engineering and GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
- Monorepo architecture and full-stack development
- Daily build tracking and accountability systems
